Take-home oral study medication ( BRP ) dispense weekly dose non-clinic day . Participants ask attend clinic twice weekly observe BRP dosing , collection urine sample , assessment , medical management . Following 8-week active medication phase , participant complete follow-up phase , include medication taper post-medication phase follow-up visit Week 9 .
